evidence.text: These actions are also unlawful because they violate the constitutional Separation of Powers and constitute unlawful ultra vires agency action. 11.  This suit seeks declaratory and injunctive relief against Defendants’ unlawful restriction of IES’s and its Centers’ data, and against Defendants’ imminent and ongoing failure to maintain and update IES’s and its Centers’ data as required by Congress.
